modules.eval package¶

Submodules¶

modules.eval.usereval module¶

class Evaluation(domain, subgraph: dict = None, logger: utils.logger.DiasysLogger = <DiasysLogger adviser (NOTSET)>)[source]¶

Bases: modules.module.Module

end_dialog(sim_goal)[source]¶

Procedure to be executed once the end dialog signal has been raised.

Parameters

sim_goal – Goal of user (used e.g. when training a policy against a user simulator)

Returns:

forward(dialog_graph, sys_act: utils.sysact.SysAct, **kwargs) → {}[source]¶

The main functionality of the module should be implemented here. Through this method the module interacts with other ones. Therefore, the kwargs play a fundamental role by carrying the information exchanged.

Parameters

  • dialog_graph (DialogSystem) – The dialog system this module is part of. Useful to access other modules, turn and dialog counters etc.

  • **kwargs (dict) – Dictionary of information passing across modules, keys and values are defined according to the modules’ definition and interaction

Returns:
